history.proof: simpl. unfold Z.mul. intros a. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1837 + ?M1838) = Gt" with "(0 ?= match match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x' => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos y'~0 | Z.neg y' => Z.neg y'~0 end) = Gt".

original: simpl. unfold Z.mul. intros a. apply Z.add_nonneg_nonneg. apply Z2Nat.inj_le. auto. apply Z.add_nonneg_nonneg; apply Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg; auto.
